page.title: 16ROYAL WELSH SHOW CONTINUED
page.content: Money earned from the staging of the show is largely used to improve the site,repair buildings and roads and to further develop the ground.Each year,one of the Welsh counties is featured which means that the county concerned carries out a special project on the site and stages an exhibition during show week.Each year the show brings hordes of visitors to Builth and this means that shops, hotels and restaurants do very well. In the show itself,one can find something of interest for everybody. There are animals of every description including sheep,cattle,pigs,horses and dogs. There is a large poultry section and rows and rows of machinery,mostly to help the farmers. The main ring is used to stage all the most exciting events which might include parachute drops and motorcycle display
